text:
pratiqcara#ti yaqj~jEna# yaqj~jaM ~MvAqcA vAcaqM brahma#NAq brahma# kaqpAlai#rEqva CandA(gg)#syAqpnOti# purOqDASaiqH sava#nAni maitrAvaruqNamEka#kapAlaqM nirva#pEd-vaqSAyai# kAqlE yaivAsau BrAtRu#vyasya vaqSA&nU#baqndhyA# sO 
EqvaiShaitasyaika#kapAlO Bavatiq na hi kaqpAlai$H paqSumar.haqtyAptu$M || 52
(brahma#Naiqvaina#maqBi ca#rati - yaqj~jO na - tAvEqvA - &syE$ndriqya - mA$pnOti -dEqvatA$H - saqptatri(gm)#Sacca ) (A9)
